revised_title: Experimental Examination of a White Metallic Substance: Platina
tldr: The author examines a white metallic substance, platina, found in the gold mines of the Spanish West Indies. Through a series of experiments, he determines its properties, gravity, and resistance to fusion. The author also investigates the effects of various substances and conditions on platina, finding that it does not easily melt or alter under intense heat or when mixed with other materials.
